text: Miles Mendoza (born 1966) was a regular contributor on BBC Radio 2's Steve Wright In The Afternoon programme for several years. He used to present a website review which debuted as Website of the Day but became a weekly feature called Website of the Week. In 2006, Miles published a book simply called Website of the Day which featured the most popular sites that had been talked about on the radio over the preceding few years. He now spends his time as a connoisseur of fine cheeses. == References == ==External links== * BBC Radio 2: Website of the Week * Website of the Day Archives * The Official Miles Mendoza Twitter account Category:1966 births Category:Living people
